welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mountain Ash, a charming town nestled in the heart of the United Kingdom. Known for its stunning natural beauty and rich history, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our welcoming community has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cardiff Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Cardiff Airport is primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fairwood Comm Airport, offering domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fairwood Comm Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
